metadata.title: USN-4614-1 -- GDM vulnerability
metadata.description: Kevin Backhouse discovered that GDM incorrectly launched the initial setup tool when the accountsservice daemon was not reachable. A local attacker able to cause accountsservice to crash or stop responding could trick GDM into launching the initial setup tool and create a privileged user.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4614-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  gir1.2-gdm-1.0 - 3.36.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2 libgdm-dev - 3.36.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2 gdm3 - 3.36.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2 libgdm1 - 3.36.3-0ubuntu0.20.04.2 No subscription required
